resources.string: On the device of your friend changed the sim card. Contact him and find out what\'s wrong. Coordinates: https://www.google.com/maps/search/?api=1&query=%1$s,%2$s. RSP
On the device of your friend changed the sim card. Contact him and find out what\'s wrong. Phone coordinates absent. RSP
I chose you for the Remote Security Phone program as a recipient of notifications for replacing a sim card with my phone. Thanks.

Permission to send sms messages is necessary to automatically alert the selected contact about the replacement of the sim card. For sending sms messages may be charged. You can get the details from your mobile operator.

Contact permission is necessary to select a contact as the recipient of the notification about the replacement of a sim card. Do not worry, the phone book data is available only to the user of the program.
Permission to manage phone calls is necessary to determine the replacement of a sim card. Do not worry, all telephone data is available only to the user of the program.
Permission to the location of the device is necessary to determine the coordinates of the device when replacing the sim card and will sending notification in the form of sms on the selected contact.
For the program to work correctly, you must select a contact who will receive a notification if the card is replaced. It is desirable that this was a person whom you trust!

Welcome to the Remote Protection service of your phone. To start the application, you need to select a contact that will receive SMS messages in the event that your device is lost and the SIM card is replaced. Note! The program will not work if the attacker formats the phone before replacing the SIM card or simply deletes the program.
